basic.description: This course encompasses the identification of field-collected specimens; analyzing meteorological and crime scene temperature data; and, calculating estimates of post-mortem interval (i.e., time since death). Students also learn about using dichotomous keys, microscopy, and entomological equipment for specimen storage and presentation.
basic.subject: CJE
basic.title: Forensic Entomology: Taxonomy and Post Mortem Interval
